short_description: With its vast steppes, towering mountains, and rich culture, Kazakhstan offers a travel experience that is both unique and unforgettable. Explore the vibrant city of Almaty, hike in the stunning Tian Shan Mountains, and sample the delicious Kazakh cuisine, from horse meat to traditional dumplings

weather.title: Kazakhstan has a continental climate with hot summers and extremely cold winters. The temperature variations can be significant, with freezing temperatures in winter and high heat in summer. The country is known for its vast steppe landscapes and continental extremes

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild temperatures, blooming landscapes and longer daylight hours. Perfect for exploring areas like Almaty, the Charyn Canyon, and the Kolsai Lakes

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Summer temperatures are warm with long days, particularly in southern parts of the country. Great time to enjoy lakes and mountains

when_to_visit.title: Hiking time
when_to_visit.short_description: Pleasant temperatures and beautiful fall foilage. Great time to enjoy hikes in the mountains to witness changing colors

when_to_visit.title: For winter sports
when_to_visit.short_description: Can be extremely cold, especially in the northern and central parts of the country. If you're interested in winter sports, this is the best time for Almaty and Shymbulak ski resorts

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Kazakhstan is during the summer months of June to September when you can experience milder temperatures, longer daylight hours, and access to the country's stunning landscapes
